00019 #include "background.h"
00020 #include "device.h"

00031 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00032 
00033 Background::Background()
00034 {
00035     ao_factor = 0.0f;
00036     ao_distance = FLT_MAX;
00037 
00038     use = true;
00039 
00040     transparent = false;
00041     need_update = true;
00042 }
00043 
00044 Background::~Background()
00045 {
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Background::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene)
00049 {
00050     if(!need_update)
00051         return;
00052     
00053     device_free(device, dscene);
00054 
00055     /* set shader index and transparent option */
00056     KernelBackground *kbackground = &dscene->data.background;
00057 
00058     kbackground->ao_factor = ao_factor;
00059     kbackground->ao_distance = ao_distance;
00060 
00061     kbackground->transparent = transparent;
00062     if(use)
00063         kbackground->shader = scene->shader_manager->get_shader_id(scene->default_background);
00064     else
00065         kbackground->shader = scene->shader_manager->get_shader_id(scene->default_empty);
00066 
00067     need_update = false;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void Background::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00071 {
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool Background::modified(const Background& background)
00075 {
00076     return !(transparent == background.transparent &&
00077         use == background.use &&
00078         ao_factor == background.ao_factor &&
00079         ao_distance == background.ao_distance);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void Background::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00083 {
00084     scene->integrator->tag_update(scene);
00085     need_update = true;
00086 }
